extendedInfo.description: DosBox Manager serves as a Game/Profile Manager (similar to D-Fend Reloaded) add-on for DosBox Turbo (required). It makes managing multiple DOSBox configuration files easy by offering a clean interface, shortcuts and a graphical launcher. Once your DOS games are configured in DosBox Manager, its very easy to setup or start them, or alter their configuration.Features:=========â REQUIRES: DosBox Turbo (2.0.0+): http://goo.gl/PNNMeâ Manage Multiple DosBox Turbo Games/Profilesâ Access to full DosBox Turbo Configuration for each profileâ Launch Games with a single clickâ Edit autoexec.bat to allow automatic startupâ Import custom icons (Dos Cover Art) - Android 2.1+â Use System Text editor (if installed) to edit config file.Support:========Questions? Need Help?  Please e-mail me for support.  Google does not allow me to answer or respond to comments on the Google Play Marketplace.

reviews.title: What! ?
reviews.comment: Not a computer wiz but what the bloody hell do I type at the beginning!? I don\'t have it hooked up to anything,  somebody PLEASE HELP!!!!
reviews.author: Alex piechowski

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Great addition to your DosBox Turbo program. Keep up the great work.
reviews.author: John Jara

reviews.title: Great program to access DOS programs
reviews.comment: Does just what it says. Great if you remember DOS from back in the day. Allows for creation of batch entry of commands via seperate autoexec.bat files. Highly recommended download once you have installed DOSBOX Turbo.
reviews.author: Fred Brown

reviews.title: crashes
reviews.comment: every time I open the side menu.

reviews.comment: Where to put mt32 Rom files: root internal storage or dosbox folder (profile location)?

reviews.comment: Awesome

reviews.title: controls portion locks up
reviews.comment: I cant add unique controls profiles to this because when the phone rotates, it causes it not to be able to add new controls. Sadly thats the only reason i got this app. Id rather be able to switch controls profiles within dosbox turbo itself, bc it would be more convenient.
reviews.author: Joseph Hines

reviews.title: very useful
reviews.comment: obviously, makes managing and running different dosbox configurations a breeze.
reviews.author: lalo lalouve

reviews.title: Awesome. 2.00
reviews.comment: Strange that cycles are unselected after the update. Have to reselect \"auto\" in most games so that they will run. Otherwise awesome as usual.
reviews.author: Rob MATHESON

reviews.title: Super easy to configure and run dos games!
reviews.comment: I love that with this manager, I don\'t have to fiddle with configurations every time I want to start a new game. Set it up once just the way I want it, then just click to run. Reminds me a lot of Boxer for mac.
reviews.author: Yana Malysheva

reviews.title: Works perfectly
reviews.comment: I literally blew the dust off of a couple of old games and now can replay them!
reviews.author: Colin Lammie

reviews.title: Valid
reviews.comment: Is a very good app but to unleash the power of dosbox it will be better to directly edit the profile configuration file.

reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Makes launching games painless
reviews.comment: Lets you set a custom configuration for each game, and you can even edit the config file to mount .cue/.bin ISO files and launch the game automatically. Easy to set up and use if you\'re familiar with DosBox on the PC. Just make sure you enable manual mode in the settings or it will overwrite your changes
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome frontend
reviews.comment: really handy frontend for the high performing dosbox turbo
reviews.author: A Google User
